EmailTemplate.description: Send notification to an agent whenever case comment is created.
EmailTemplate.name: Case Comment Notification to Agent
EmailTemplate.subject: Case Comment on Case {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.OwnerFullName},
A new case comment created by {!Case.Contact} on {!Case.CaseNumber}. Please take a look.
Case : {!$Label.Agent_URL}{!Case.Id}/view
Thank you Ecolab Team
